DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine which is the best surgery to treat different severity scales of cubital tunnel syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Different Surgical Treatments for Different Scales of Cubital Tunnel Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine which one of the simple decompression,anterior subcutaneous and intramuscular transposition of the ulnar nerve has the best outcomes for moderate and severe cubital tunnel syndrome.
DOC.criteria: patients with confirmed cubital tunnel syndrome moderate and severe cubital tunnel syndrome. Significant cervical spine and shoulder disease deformity or distortion of the cubital tunnel due to previous trauma to elbow recurrent cubital tunnel syndrome after previous surgery mild cubital tunnel syndrome.
DOC.keyword: anterior subcutaneous transposition of ulnar nerve
anterior intramuscular transposition of ulnar nerve
